Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Some final edits were made in release-1.4, these need to be applied to master as well.

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: ~denyeart - Were the final edits applied to master? Can this be closed?

Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: ~angelo.decaro I think this can be closed now? https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.4/msp.html#identity-classification

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Looks like ~negupta cherry picked the final edits back to master in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/fabric/+/33204/ , we are good to close this now.
